title: Britain’s Next Tour de France Winner? Joe Blackmore Joins Pogačar, Bernal as Champion of U23 Kingmaker L’Avenir
content:
Israel-Premier Tech's 21-year-old rookie becomes first Brit to earn prestigious victory at Tour de l'Avenir after only recently pivoting away from MTB, CX.

Read the full article at Britain’s Next Tour de France Winner? Joe Blackmore Joins Pogačar, Bernal as Champion of U23 Kingmaker L’Avenir on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
